explanation: based on the historical price data provided, meta has shown a significant upward trend in the past year, moving from a low of 106.40 in november 2022 to 328.49 in november 2023. this represents a substantial increase in value, suggesting strong positive momentum. the other stocks have either shown more modest increases or have decreased in value over the same period. for instance, dis has decreased from 96.48 in november 2022 to 90.37 in november 2023, gme has decreased from 26.21 to 13.15, googl has shown a slight increase from 93.91 to 133.38, and spy has increased from 391.12 to 445.25. given the strong performance and growth trajectory of meta, it is reasonable to expect that this trend may continue into december 2023, potentially offering the highest return on investment within the one-month timeframe specified. therefore, investing 10000 dollars in meta appears to be the most promising option for maximizing profit by the end of december 2023.
